channel.title: Mandelbrot on Shashank Prasanna

item.title: Benchmarking Modular MojoðŸ”¥ and PyTorch torch.compile() on Mandelbrot function
item.description: Last week, Modular - an startup co-founded by Chris Lattner (of LLVM, Swift, MLIR fame), announced a brand new high-performance language called MojoðŸ”¥. MojoðŸ”¥ looks and reads like Python but that’s only on the surface, underneath the familiar Python syntax Mojo uses it’s own JIT and AOT compilation process to accelerate Python code. Although Mojo doesn’t fully support all of Python today, according to Mojo docs, over time Mojo is expected to become a superset of Python.
